{"id":1295322866,"question_id":7,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"5Â months","timestamp":1718950887,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1295322866/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Integer","memory":"7.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    Solution(){\n        ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n        cin.tie(nullptr);\n        cout.tie(nullptr);\n    }\n    int reverse(int x) {\n        \n        long long int y = 0;\n\n        while(x){\n            y = y*10;\n            int last_dig = x%10;\n            y = y + last_dig;\n            x = x/10;\n\n            if(y > pow(2,31)-1  || y < -1*pow(2,31)){\n                return 0;\n            }\n        }\n\n        if(x < 0){\n            y = -1*y;\n        }\n\n        return y;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-integer","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
